title: Drawing, "Man with a Scythe", ca. 1865
medium: Graphite, corrections in brush and white gouache on heavy white wove paper.
markings: Stamped in black ink, at lower right corner: Museum for the Arts of Decoration, Cooper Union [Lugt, 457d].
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a man, shown from the back, mowing with a scythe at lower center foreground while the upper bodies of two other men are visible in the field at right middleground; a building, fence and trees fill the horizon in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Man with a Scythe", ca. 1865.
ca. 1865. Graphite, corrections in brush and white gouache on heavy white wove paper.. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-258.
